A Hunter’s Tools GeoScapes Tutorial, familiarize yourself with the features of the app, complete as many times as you need Bucky’s gone rogue, and with him, so has any chance for UW-Madison students to have affordable housing (slim as that chance may be). To find the highly implausible savior of this whole mess you’ll need to acquaint yourself with the tools of the trade: GeoScapes. A Badger’s Shame Find Bucky (and the axe) at the Camp Randall Arch in order to calm him down." It’s no secret that the UW-Madison football team has taken a deep dive into insignificance. Following the tragic thanksgiving game, Bucky has stolen the Axe in a desperate gamble to bring back relevance to the team. Retrieve the Axe, hidden at Camp Randall, in order to redirect Bucky’s rage into a more… healthy outlet. Go To Camp Randall Find Bucky and the Axe A Badger’s Origin Find Abe Lincoln on Bascom Hill and use his description to inspire Bucky. With Bucky in tow, it’s now up to you to reignite the spark that started it all- Bascom hill (Not my choice of inspiration, but hey- if it works it works.) Go to the Hill, and find Honest Abe, a suitable companion for this endeavor - with any luck, he’ll be able to help you find your way forward. Go to Bascom Hill Take a photo of the Sign next to Abe A Badger’s Escape Go to the Memorial Union and place treats around the area in order to lure bucky Turns out Badgers don’t really understand platitudes. With Bucky on the run, the only way to get him back is to place treats at his favorite spot- The Terrace. Go To Memorial Union Place Three “Lures” “Catch” Bucky ARFragment MLFragment ARFragment
